    • build

      @NotNull public @NotNull TripletCard build() throws IllegalCardBuildException
      Description copied from class: ObjectiveCard.Builder
      Builds an instance of T, which extends ObjectiveCard.

      This method is responsible for creating the ObjectiveCard and ensuring that it is in a valid state. It uses the id and points provided to the Builder's constructor to set the corresponding fields of the ObjectiveCard.

      This method is abstract and must be implemented by subclasses of this Builder. The specific implementation will depend on the specific type of ObjectiveCard being built.

      Note: This method can throw an IllegalCardBuildException if the ObjectiveCard cannot be built in a valid state.

      Specified by:
      build in class PositioningCard.Builder<TripletCard>
      Returns:
      An instance of T, which extends ObjectiveCard.
      Throws:
      IllegalCardBuildException - if the ObjectiveCard cannot be built in a valid state.
